attributes.action: Minimum 15 Years sentence for sexual offences against a minor.
attributes.additional_details: I'd like parliament to increase these sentences to deter these criminals from committing these crimes against children as I believe the law in place now it's too soft.
attributes.background: I would like the Government to increase the minimum custodial sentence for any offenders found guilty of Sexual offences including, grooming and also sending and recieving indecent images of children to a minimum of 15 Years.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following:

Introduce mandatory life sentences for child sex offences
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/715556 

Toughen up the law to ensure stricter punishment for child sexual abuse material
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700084

Mandatory minimum sentences for offences relating to indecent images of children
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713278

Review minimum sentences for perpetrators of violence and sexual abuse
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/713293
